cast.overview: Two 13-year-old boys spend an idyllic summer together, but their connection is put to the test when they become the subject of speculation at school.
cast.title: Close

details.biography:
Gustav De Waele is a famous actor from Belgium. He rose to fame for his role in Close. He was born in Brussels, Belgium, and studies acting at a school for artists also in Brussels.

He managed to make a name for himself both in his country and in the world with the movie 'Close' in 2022, and received praise from many movie critics around the world.
details.name: Gustav De Waele
